summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5635 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 1, University View Addition, being the alley between 34th Avenue Northeast and 35th Avenue Northeast, from East 57th Street to East 60th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 74349, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
